title: I Had A Couple...
description:
Karl Ravech and Buster discuss Buster’s interesting postgame interview with Justin Verlander, Verlander getting his first World Series win, Verlander’s embrace with Dusty Baker, big defensive moments from Chas McCormick and Trey Mancini, if Jeremy Peña is the frontrunner for World Series MVP, and Zack Wheeler on extra rest. Then, Sarah Langs stops by to talk about the last time a team hit a lead off home run after being no-hit in the playoffs, the streak of teams clinching on the road in the playoffs and who the Astros should start in a potential Game 7.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Buster, Karl Ravech and Sarah Langs recap an electric Game 5 win for the Astros and lookahead to the series heading back to Houston
